pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cross-Validation for the SVD (Bi-Cross-Validation) // Methods for choosing the rank of an SVD approximation via cross validation. The package provides both Gabriel-style "block" holdouts and Wold-style "speckled" holdouts. It also includes an implementation of the SVDImpute algorithm. For more information about Bi-cross-validation, see Owen Perry's 2009 AoAS article (at http://arxiv.org/abs/0908.2062) and Perry's 2009 PhD thesis (at http://arxiv.org/abs/0909.3052).
